text.data-name: 3.1 You will need to register for a Tasty Food account for you to use the Platform. When you register for a Tasty Food account we will ask you to provide your personal information including a valid email address, mobile phone number and a unique password,
text.tspan: 3.1 You will need to register for a Tasty Food account for you to
use the Platform. When you register for a Tasty Food account
we will ask you to provide your personal information including a
valid email address, mobile phone number and a unique
password, Restaurant name, License number, NID and address.
Your unique password should not be shared with anyone and
you agree to keep it secret at all times. You are solely
responsible for keeping your password safe. Save for cases of
fraud or abuse which are not your fault, you accept that all
Orders from your restaurant are your sole responsibility.
3.2 You get the option like Today’s Menu, Add New items, Order
Status, Notifications, Your Profile, Terms and conditions. At
Today’s Menu, you can edit or delete any food items. At Add
New Items, You can add any item you want to serve, by setting
the name, category, a short description, price, offer etc. At Order
Status, You can set the current process status of the ordered
food, and get option of confirming/canceling the order. At
Notification, you get the message of getting an order. At Your
Profile, you have the option of editing the information. And
finally, after reaching & reading our Terms & Conditions and still
using this app, you accept all our Terms & Conditions.
3.3 You are obliged to provide information that is complete,
accurate and truthful for the proper processing of the Order.
3.4 If you wish to delete your Tasty Food account, please send
us an email requesting the same. We may restrict, suspend or
terminate your Tasty Food account and/or use of the Platforms,
if we reasonably believe that:
3.4.1 Someone other than you is using your Tasty Food
account; or
3.4.2 Where you are suspected or discovered to have been
involved in any activity or conduct that is in breach of these
Terms, our policies and guidelines, or involved in activity or
conduct which we deem in our sole discretion to be an abuse of
the Platforms.
3.4.3 Tasty Food reserves the right to investigate and take
appropriate legal action against anyone who, are using the
Platforms for any purpose in violation of local, state, or federal
laws or regulations, posting content that constitutes cyber-
bullying, as determined by Tasty Food in its sole discretion.
